Title: Killed by Death
Plot: When Buffy is admitted to hospital with a raging fever she meets a young boy, Ryan, who has the same flu virus and claims that the sick children in the hospital are being persecuted by a monster that may be death himself.
GuestStars: Robert Munic, Denise Johnson, James Jude Courtney, Richard Herd, Andrew Ducote, Willie Garson, Juanita Jennings, Mimi Paley, Kristine Sutherland
